Class DefaultPackageListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.adamcin.oakpal.core.AbstractViolationReporter

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PackageListener, ScanListener, ViolationReporter

    public class DefaultPackageListener
extends AbstractViolationReporter
implements PackageListener
    Default implementation of PackageListener.

      • onBeginPackage

        public void onBeginPackage(org.apache.jackrabbit.vault.packaging.PackageId packageId,
                           File file)
        Description copied from interface: PackageListener
        Called after the package is uploaded to the package manager at the beginning of the scan. Track subsequent events using the package ID provided to this method. This method will only be called once for each package provided to PackageScanner.scanPackages(File...).
        Specified by:
        onBeginPackage in interface PackageListener
        Parameters:
        packageId - the package ID of the newly opened package
        file - the package file that will be opened
